name: dtf

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
DTF (Data Transfer Framework) is a general I/O arbitration middleware
designed for multi-component applications that use file-base component
coupling. DTF works for applications that use the Parallel netCDF
(PnetCDF) library for file I/O. It allows the user to transparently
replace file I/O with sending the data directly between the components.

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
Intel MPI Library is a multifabric message-passing library that
implements the open-source MPICH specification. Use the library to
create, maintain, and test advanced, complex applications that perform
better on high-performance computing (HPC) clusters based on Intel
processors. LICENSE INFORMATION: By downloading and using this software,
you agree to the terms and conditions of the software license agreements
at https://intel.ly/393CijO.

dependencies.name: m4
dependencies.description: GNU M4 is an implementation of the traditional Unix macro processor.

dependencies.name: autoconf
dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools

dependencies.name: automake
dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools

dependencies.name: libtool
dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.
